name: Modular Racers
description:
A brand new game where you can race your friends (Or other people), for the victory, test, build and design your own car. See who has the better car, in various game modes. But the most prominent being, where you must race your friends to the finish line carrying an egg. Just don't let the egg crack, or you have to restart at the start of the level.

Controls

---------------

A and D

<- and ->

The Buttons

- By Nocrom Studios 

- Oreo Osborn you know who you are
